long_description: The REI Wheely Beast 21 is a friendly and fun, yet rugged and practical carryon luggage option. It offers easy loading and a dependable handle and wheel system, and fits in most airline overhead bins. Panel-opening main compartment gives you easy access to the contents; interior compression straps hold contents in place. Organize small items with 3 zip pockets inside the main compartment: 1 mesh pocket underneath the lid panel and 1 each on either side of the bag. Exterior side zipper pocket for quick access to small items; rear flat envelope-style pocket holds items like tickets and magazines. Rugged wheels roll smoothly and quietly as you dash through the airport terminal and navigate your way to the hotel lobby. Telescoping handle lets you pull the duffel with ease and control; locks into up/down position and has soft-touch handle grip. Top and side grab handles ease hauling. ID window is safely secured underneath the REI Wheely Beast's top flap. Interior frame provides structure and upright stability for transport ease. Main compartment zipper can be secured with a standard travel lock, sold separately.
short_description: The REI Wheely Beast 21 is a friendly and fun, yet rugged and practical carryon luggage option. It offers easy loading and a dependable handle and wheel system, and fits in most airline overhead bins.
